review: Wonderful pedestrian in Bengaluru. I recommend this doctor. He is explain everything in detail to us

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I took appointment with the doctor after checking the review on Practo but the reviews were totally opposite to what I felt . ****** ** *** ******* **** ***** **** * ***** *** **** *** ** *** **** *** ******* *** *** ** ** *** **** ** * *** ***** **** *** ******* ** **** *** *****  .

I visited Manipal hospital , Whitefield on Sunday after taking the appointment.  I was late by 30 minutes and doctor went for a round and we waited for 30 more minutes to get our turn. That was absolutely fine. Patients who have not taken prior appointment were asked to go through emergency  (I did not understand the reason ) route.

It was fine until few minutes of the consultation as he was asking to get some test done and refer to some other doctor but when we started asking additional questions , he started getting irritated. He was arguing like for the queries you can come some other day as it is Sunday for me also . * ** *** ********** ** *** **** ** ********* ****** * *** *** *** ******* ****** ** **** *** ****** ** **** *** **** *** ******* **** *** **** ****** *** ***** * ******* ** * ****  Dynamically Charge the patient on the number of question they ask. 

I do not recommend the doctor *** **** ** ******** **** ** **** ***** *** *** **** ***** ******* **** *** ******* *** ** ****** *** *** Doctor should at least listen to the patient , give correct advice , and answer their queries. This doctor getting irritated with only 4-5 patient *** *** **** ** ****** *** ***** *** ***** ** ***** ******** ** *** ***  **** ***** ******* **** ** ********
Awesome doctor, very friendly, explained the present situation of influenza going around. Gave a very systematic approach to treat this. Highly recommended for kids.
